variable.comment: Constant representing the boolean value TRUE.
variable.name: TRUE

variable.comment: Constant representing the boolean value FALSE.
variable.name: FALSE

variable.comment: Maximum spawn level.
variable.name: MaxSpawnLevel

variable.comment: Maximum spawn quantity.
variable.name: MAXSPAWNCOUNT

variable.comment: Title Screen.
variable.name: TITLE

variable.comment: Classic Mode.
variable.name: CLASSIC

variable.comment: Pacifist Mode.
variable.name: PACIFIST

variable.comment: Survival Mode.
variable.name: SURVIVAL

variable.comment: Number of Bombs the Player has.
variable.name: Bombs

variable.comment: Number of Lives the Player has.
variable.name: Lives

variable.comment: Current score.
variable.name: Score

variable.comment: Current High Score.
variable.name: HighScore

variable.comment: Time the player is being pacifist.
variable.name: PacifistTime

variable.comment: Highest pacifist time the player had.
variable.name: BestPacifist

variable.comment: Time the player survived.
variable.name: SurvivalTime

variable.comment: Best survival time the player got.
variable.name: BestSurvival

variable.comment: Current score multiplier.
variable.name: Multiplier

variable.comment: Current game mode.
variable.name: CurrentMode

variable.comment: Flag that checks if player is alive.
variable.name: IsPlayerAlive

variable.comment: Has the player shot on the last second?
variable.name: IsPlayerPacifist

variable.comment: Is the player using the bomb right now?
variable.name: IsUsingBomb

variable.comment: Number of shots the player fires.
variable.name: ShotNumber

variable.comment: Kills the player made in this current life.
variable.name: Kills

variable.comment: Score where the player will get the next extra life.
variable.name: ExtraLifeScore

variable.comment: Score where the player will get the next extra bomb.
variable.name: ExtraBombScore

variable.comment: Score where the player will get the next shooting change.
variable.name: ShootChangeScore

variable.comment: Is enemy spawning enabled?
variable.name: SpawningEnabled

variable.comment: Current spawning level.
variable.name: SpawningLevel

variable.comment: Number of enemies to be spawned
variable.name: SpawnCount

variable.comment: Spawn difficulty value, will decide what will spawn.
variable.name: SpawnValue

variable.comment: Time interval between spawns.
variable.name: SpawnTimer

sub-events.comment: If the player is not on any defined game mode, goes to title screen.
Initializes the game - Classic Mode.
Initializes the game - Pacifist Mode.
Initializes the game - Survival Mode.
At the end of the layout, set mode to TITLE.
If the player beats the High Score, save new High Score on Local Storage.
If the player beats the Best Pacifist time, save new Best Pacifist on Local Storage.
If the player beats the Best Survival time, save new Best Survival on Local Storage.
Updates Survival and Pacifist time, and resets the score if the condition for time counting is broken.

event-group.description: Control events and alternative control methods.
event-group.title: Controls

sub-events.comment:
Shoots if the shooting conditions are met: * Player must not be on Pacifist Mode * Player can only shoot every 0.1 seconds * Player must do one shooting action.
The shooting actions are: * Using the Gamepad Right Stick in one direction; * Pressing the Left mouse button.
The player angle is decided by: * Right analog stick position, if the player is using the gamepad. * Mouse position, if the mouse button is pressed.
Adds alternative inputs for the Go Left Player command.
Adds alternative inputs for the Go Up Player command.
Adds alternative inputs for the Go Right Player command.
Adds alternative inputs for the Go Down Player command.
Translates Gamepad left stick axis input into ship movement.
Adds the "Use Bomb" command to a lot of inputs, so the player has choice on how he prefers to use it.

event-group.description: Player and player effects/helpers (shot, flame jet) events.
event-group.title: Player

sub-events.comment: Respawns player after death, if it still has lives.
Destroy shot if it goes outside screen.
Brings all the player components (Player ship, aim triangle and particle jet) together, every tick.
Sets the Player Alive flag to TRUE when the player is created.
Sets the Pacifist flag if the player is pacifist.
Sets the Player Alive flag to FALSE when the player dies.
Hide the aim triangle if player is dead.
Show the aim triangle if the player is alive.

event-group.description: Enemy spawning, spawning dificulty, spawning mode and type control.
event-group.title: Spawning

sub-events.comment: Decide the next spawn each spawn cycle.
Spawn Enemies each spawn cycle.
If Spawn Value is 0, spawn nothing, but calculate a new spawn probability for the next Spawns.
If Spawn Value is 1, spawn a Pinwheel, with a chance of leveling the Spawn Value up or down.
If Spawn Value is 2, spawn a Diamond, with a chance of leveling the Spawn Value up or down.
If Spawn Value is 3, spawn a Pinwheel AND a Diamond, with a chance of leveling the Spawn Value up or down.
If Spawn Value is 4, spawn a Green Square.
If Spawn Value is 5, spawns one Green Square, with a chance of changing up to two levels up or down.
If Spawn Value is 6, spawns pink boxes.
If Spawn Value is 7, spawn a diamond horde.
If Spawn Value is 8, spawns snake.
If Spawn Value is 9, spawns black hole and resets the spawn value.
If Spawn Value is 10, spawns one Pink Box with one Green Box, with a chance of changing up to two levels down.
If Spawn Value is 11, spawns Jacks swarms.
If Spawn Value is 12, spawns Green Boxes swarms.
If Spawn Value is 13, spawns Pink Boxes swarms.
If Spawn Value is 14, spawns a Pac Men.
Ups Spawning level from time to time.
Ups spawn count from time to time.
Changes the grid color, rotating between all colors, at the interval of 0.1 Hue per tick.
When an explosive is destroyed, shows explosion.
Deactivates distortion effects on start.
Plays the level music when the layout is loaded.
Update the lives, bombs, score and high score every frame - Classic Mode.
Update the lives, bombs, score and high score every frame - Pacifist Mode.
Update the lives, bombs, score and high score every frame - Survival Mode.
